title: Sankore Madrasa Timbuktu image circa 1300 Q1

content.question: The structure shown in the image best illustrates which of the following?

choices.label: Development of military institutions to control populations
Rulers’ use of monumental buildings to spread learning and culture
Infrastructure created by empires to enable safe and easy trade
Cultural influences from European trading-post empires

content.answer: Rulers’ use of monumental buildings to spread learning and culture

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Identify a historical concept, development, or process.
